content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While discussing rental prices for the apartment in Duisburg, let me start by proposing a high initial figure of 1100 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating further to reach a mutually agreeable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive for me. I could pay 850 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offered price significantly falls short of my initial expectation and doesn't reflect my intention to maximize the rental income. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
